Airly I understand English isn't your first language,
so little mistakes are acceptable and I don't mean to
sound rude, but the normal turn is "Long live" not
"long life".  By the way can you translate this:

Reina crecio muy querida mimada.  Tenia unos cuatos
trabajos (something comes here that goes off the page)
hacer en casa, como buscar el periodico y vigilar que
los cuervos (here too) quedaran mucho rato en el
jardin del frente.

--- airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
> I started to post in this RPG, exactly in September
> 15 more or less. 
> I just have to said : LONG LIFE TO NBWRPG!!!!!
> 
>
